Search for Flights
{{flight.airline}}
Мест осталось {{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}}
{{flight.departure?.place}}
{{flight.departure?.time | date}}
{{flight.departure?.time | date:'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival?.place}}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date}}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date:'shortTime'}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FlightService } from './../api/services/flight.service'; import { FlightRm } from '../api/models/flight-rm'; import { TimePlaceRm } from '../api/models/time-place-rm'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchResult: FlightRm[] = [] constructor(private flightService: FlightService) { } search() { this.flightService.flightGet({}) .subscribe(r => this.searchResult = r) } }
